name: ESCAPE Demo
description:
ESCAPE is a small Demo for a possible bigger project that was made in 3 hours using 'Horror FPS Kit'. This was made on the 10th of March 2019 using Unity. This Demo is meant to show most of the features of a bigger project and of the asset pack. This was made because I wanted to see how this pack worked. Saving doesn't work.

You can visit my temporary website here
